This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties receive a fair deal while maximizing the value for you. I trust this proposition aligns well with your interests and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of facilitating this transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500.
